price: 18. En keer jullie gezichten niet af van de mensen, en wandel niet vol hoogmoed over de aarde. Want Allah houdt niet van de hoogmoedige noch de opschepper.
arabic: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṣaʿʿir khaddaka lilnnāsi walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla mukh'tālin fakhūrin
